Material/Prep Required: Prepared list of binary holiday questions
Description: Teams guess the majority preference on holiday topics (e.g. 'Elf' vs 'Home Alone').
Pairs race waddling with a balloon between their backs. Don't drop it!
Everyone writes a fun fact. Guess who the fact belongs to!

Material/Prep Required: List of true/false Christmas trivia facts
Description: Spot the fake Christmas traditions and trivia.

Material/Prep Required: Slides/images of emoji puzzles on phone/TV
Description: Decipher movie/song titles written in emojis.

Material/Prep Required: Slips of paper with holiday prompts, timer, bowl/hat
Description: Classic charades with a festive twist. Act it out!
Protect the bows on your back while trying to survive. Last one with bows wins!

Material/Prep Required: Balloons, Buckets, Cotton Balls/Ping Pong Balls
Description: Keep a balloon in the air while scooping balls into a bucket against the clock.

Material/Prep Required: Party Squawkers, Solo Cups, Ping Pong Balls
Description: Blow into party squawkers to knock balls off cups, then stack them up!
Cycle stack 10 cups into a pyramid and back down as fast as possible.
